title: Consider Visual Accessibility
text: High contrast colors help people with visual impairments distinguish text and images more easily.

title: Font Size Matters
text: Using large fonts ensures that text is readable for individuals with low vision.

title: Avoid Over-Reliance on Color
text: Relying solely on color to convey information can be problematic for those with color blindness.

title: Complex Animations Can Be Distracting
text: Complex animations may not be easily perceived by individuals with visual impairments.

hintAnswer: Use high contrast colors and large fonts
title: Select the Best Option
text: Choose the option that includes high contrast colors and large fonts.
choices: Use high contrast colors and large fonts
Rely on color alone to convey information
Use small text to fit more content
